Message: I am sorry today I can't train I am very tired for the hot temperature so I will stay at home

It's completely understandable to prioritize rest, especially in challenging weather. However, remember, we'll be here when you're ready to take on new challenges again. Stay hydrated and take care of yourself.
I don't want to train, you are only a robot and I don't take order from you

Of course, my purpose isn't to command but to support and motivate when desired. Your well-being matters most, so please make choices that bring you comfort and balance. I'm here whenever needed as a source of encouragement.
today I don't want to train, because I have to study

Understood. Studying is crucial too, and it shows your dedication to self-improvement. Perhaps when academic demands ease, you might consider returning to physical activities for a well-rounded lifestyle. Take good care of your studies today.
